overview: When Galindo, an acid unsuccessful film director, sees the triumph of" La gallina Turuleca " at the 2021 Goya gala, he discovers that there is a way to win a Goya automatically: to be the only animated film that comes in. Then Galindo decides to make an animated film to get so much desired Goya. For this he goes in search of his old companions of film adventures: Pablo and Dharma.
title: Gora Automatikoa
